item.description:
- Ron Paul Fest North -

Apologies for the short notice on this one. A meetup member has kindly offered her home for a Ron Paul celebration this weekend for those not going to Tampa. Please email robcarlyb@yahoo.com for address and directions if you wish to attend.

"For those that can't get to Tampa, join us for our own Ron Paul fest here! It won't be the same of course but at least we can all get together and have our own good time w/ like-minded folks. A side-dish or dessert would be greatly appreciated. We'll supply the "grill" food and beverages. If u r so inclined, bring a bathing suit/towel for a swim in the river or dip in the hot tub."

As many of you know it's always a fun event when you are around like-minded lovers of freedom and liberty, and this gathering is sure to be a great time.
item.how_to_find_us: Email ﻿robcarlyb@yahoo.com﻿ for address and directions if you wish to attend.
item.name: Ron Paul Fest North
